title: Burundi Loans To Private Sector
description: Loans to Private Sector in Burundi increased to 2696.92 BIF Billion in May from 2609.41 BIF Billion in April of 2022. Loans to Private Sector in Burundi averaged 860.34 BIF Billion from 2008 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 2696.92 BIF Billion in May of 2022 and a record low of 217.28 BIF Billion in February of 2008. This page provides the latest reported value for - Burundi Loans To Private Sector - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: Bank of Burundi
